title: Develop a Market Entry Strategy
description: For a client wanting to enter a new country, an agent must recommend a market entry strategy.

tasks.description: Research the target country's regulations, competition, and consumer behavior.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers relevant data on the new market.

tasks.description: Analyze different market entry modes (e.g., 'Exporting', 'Joint Venture', 'Direct Investment').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent lists the pros and cons of each entry mode in the context of the target country.

tasks.description: Recommend the most suitable entry strategy based on the research and analysis.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear recommendation (e.g., 'A joint venture is recommended to navigate local regulations').
